events.title: Peter Pan is a success on its opening night

movie.title: Finding Neverland
movie.plot: During a writing slump, playwright J.M. Barrie meets a widow and her three children—who soon become an important part of Barrie’s life and the inspiration that lead him to create his masterpiece. Peter Pan'.

events.title: Live at the Austin Outhouse is recorded on two consecutive nights, weeks before Blaze's death

movie.title: Blaze
movie.plot: A re-imagining of the life and times of Blaze Foley, the unsung songwriting legend of the Texas Outlaw Music movement.
